nodes.documentation:
This event is triggered for store hash notification messages and outputs the following:
- issuer - owner of the contract
- documentHash
- timeOfIssue
nodes.name: HashAdded

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Error: this hash already exists in contract"

arguments.value: Error: this hash already exists in contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Error: this hash already exists in contract"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Error: this hash does not exist already exists in contract"

arguments.value: Error: this hash does not exist already exists in contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Error: this hash does not exist already exists in contract"
